channel.title: Herald-Tribune (Custom RSS - Broad Article Grab)
channel.description: A personal RSS feed with broader article scraping from heraldtribune.com

item.title: Fly away! Breeze adds 19 new routes, including several from Florida
item.description: Sometimes you just need to get away. Even if where you are is where others head to when they want to get away.

item.title: Open kitchen shelves may look great, Marni says, but are they for you?
item.description: I know it’s tempting. You see those clean, uncluttered open shelves in kitchens, with their matching ceramic dishes, beautifully staged glassware, lots of negative space, and you think, “Why not? If my kitchen had open shelving, my belongings would look great, too! Plus, everything would be so easy to reach.”

item.title: Marni's sentimental guide to giving the past a presence in our homes
item.description: Over the years, I have earned the reputation as the stuff police. I am forever nagging you to purge, declutter, toss, donate, edit, dump, oust, clear, lighten up and let go. But today, sit down, I am going to sentimentally suggest that some old things you should keep.

item.title: Tampa rapper Doechii snubs Florida during upcoming tour. See all shows
item.description: Doechiiis hitting the road this fall!

item.title: 29 local restaurants get high-priority violations, 6 ace inspections
item.description: Ourdigital databaseof restaurant health inspections is updated regularly with the latest information on which Sarasota, Bradenton and Venice area restaurants passed or failed.

item.title: Florida AG files porn lawsuit, citing risk to minors
item.description: Florida's attorney generalfiled alawsuitagainst a number of domestic and foreign companies that ownporn siteshe says are violating a state law requiring age verification to view adult content.

item.title: 'Bachelor in Paradise' had 2 rose ceremonies last night…
item.description: Last night's episode of "Bachelor in Paradise"raised the stakes for the contestants, who now all have a chance at going home up to $500,000 richer, depending on how strong their relationships become in the next few weeks.

item.title: 2023 Cardinal Mooney state champion win All-Time Best…
item.description: The Herald-Tribune has gone back and documented the area football teams that have won state championships.

item.title: Florida in top 10 worst states to have a baby on this…
item.description: Living in Florida is expensive, and having kids makes it even more costly.

item.title: E. coli infections linked to raw milk from Florida farm…
item.description: Twenty-onepeople in Central and northeast Floridahave been infected by Campylobacter and E. coli related to drinking raw milk, including six children under 10, according to the Florida Department of Health,. Severe complications were reported in at least two cases.

item.title: Contract: Florida prepping Camp Blanding for immigration…
item.description: Florida is preparing a second immigration detention center, which is already being labeled in public records as the "North Detention Facility."

item.title: Who's committed, who has offers: IMG Academy's top football recruits
item.description: IMG Academy has a new head coach, and plenty of transfers ready to make an impact.

item.title: POLL: Vote for best Sarasota, Manatee high school football game for 2025 season
item.description: There are plenty of quality games on the high school football slates this year in Manatee and Sarasota counties. Area teams are opting for out-of-area, and in some cases, out-of-state opponents when filling out their regular-season schedule. Even some of the fall classics have teams travelling up to 3 hours for a game that does not count toward their record for a chance to beef up their slates.

item.title: Four candidates in running for Manatee County Schools superintendent
item.description: Four candidates in running for Manatee County Schools superintendent

item.description: Sarasota City Commission rejects development at Temple Beth Sholom
